author: Thomas M. Burton
title: FDA Calls Out Drug Makers That Improperly Block Generic Competition
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Food and Drug Administration Thursday took the aggressive step of publicly exposing drug companies it says may be gaming the system by improperly blocking competition from generics.
The action is unusual and follows a monthslong campaign by FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb to push for more generics on the market, in order to cut the overall cost of medicines. His effort is part of a broader Trump administration initiative to make medicines more affordable.
...
